title: Loading screen not working
body:
I have been unable to load games and found myself blocked out of games, I finally fixed this however in the process I have unwillingly 'afk'ed' games due to not being able to load games when testing if i fixed the problem. now im stuck in a low priority cue for 5 games due to the client bugging my games out.
please help me out here. i don't feel I deserve this

replies.body: how did you fix this im about to smash my cp cos im blocked out of the game after champ select!!
Hey Zximo.. what ISP are you with?

> [{quoted}](name=Agent Mindstar,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=nopVkM73,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-03-06T10:19:25.995+0000)
>
> Hey Zximo.. what ISP are you with?

im Using iinet still having a problem with LOL having to delete files in rads and rename logitech files everytime i restart computer?
I had to run the stupid repair, the ? at the launcher top right hand corner

Riot cannot detect whether you left a game because you press "exit" or because the client crashed. It's one and the same to them.

As a safeguard, you aren't banned if you only have one or two games in which you bomb out of. If it's more, then the system deems you purposefully leaving games and hence applies the penalty.

If you have enough evidence and a strong enough case, you can try pleading to support to lift your penalty, though I highly doubt they'll remove it for something like this. Your best option is to just play the five games and get it over and done with.
